trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DetailsViewRow brukes til å representere en enkelt rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: Hver rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen har en angitt radtype.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser radtyper er ugyldig for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Radtypen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| En datarad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Tom dataene rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll når det finnes ingen poster for visning. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Bunntekstraden i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Overskriftsraden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| En personsøker rad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | Bruk til å fastslå rad objekttypen en DetailsViewRow den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: En DetailsViewRow-objektet har også en tilstand som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden kan være en bitvis kombinasjon av verdier i tabellen nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Angi verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow-objektet er en alternativ rad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow-objektet er i redigeringsmodus. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow-objektet er i insert-modus. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow-objektet er i tilstanden normal (standard). | Bruk til å fastslå statusen for en DetailsViewRow-objektet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll lagrer alle dataradene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut indeksen for et DetailsViewRow objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>samlingen, bruker du <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til de individuelle cellene i DetailsViewRow-objektet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en celle inneholder kontroller, kan du hente en kontroll fra cellen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>samling av cellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>metode for celle for å finne kontrollen, hvis kontrollen har en <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>-egenskap angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Til å hente en verdi for feltet fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>feltet kolonne eller en automatisk generert feltet, brukes den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>-egenskapen til cellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: For å hente en verdi for feltet fra andre kolonnetyper der verdien i feltet er bundet til en kontroll, hente først kontrollen fra en celle, og deretter bruker riktig-egenskapen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er mulig å bruke en databinding uttrykk som er direkte i et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>field-kolonnen uten å binde verdien til en egenskap for en kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet feltverdien automatisk er plassert i en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hente feltverdien, må du først hente den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>kontrollere fra en celle, og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen DetailsViewRow, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>| Verdien som er angitt av den `itemIndex` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>| Verdien som er angitt av den `rowType` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>| Verdien som er angitt av den `rowState` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om du vil sende en hendelse sidens ASP.NET server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis hendelsen ble avbrutt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for datarader.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowState-egenskapen til å avgjøre statusen til raden.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden kan være en bitvis kombinasjon av verdier i tabellen nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: | Angi verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Alternate`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>-Objektet er en alternativ rad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>-Objektet er i redigeringsmodus. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>-Objektet er i insert-modus. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>-Objektet er i tilstanden normal (standard). | Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å avgjøre statusen til en rad før du utfører en operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter radtypen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowType-egenskapen for å finne ut hvilken type rad som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objekt representerer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser gyldig typen radverdiene.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Radtypen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| En datarad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| Tom dataene rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll når det finnes ingen poster for visning. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| Bunntekstraden i kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| Overskriftsraden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| En personsøker rad <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollens. | Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å finne en radtype før du utfører en operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> verdier.
